description: 4th Year Business Administration Major from Bradenton FL. Fall '11 AM Class BK 1888. Georgia Tech is the only school I've ever wanted to attend and I've been a die hard fan since I was 7. I work for the football team. If you Hate georgia as much as any Yellow Jacket should then I'd have a beer with you.
aspects: I've always had a great time in this house, whenever I've ever needed anything my brothers have been there for me and I like to think I've returned the favor a time or two. I wasn't from around here so this experience gave me a network of people that I could rely on.
interests: Pretty much anything that involves sitting outdoors on a lawn chair for extended periods of time
quotes: "It seemed like a good idea at the time..."
name: Justin Gray
